title: Highfield Bare Fallow soil organic carbon and total nitrogen content 1959-2014
description: Soil organic carbon (SOC) and total nitrogen (N) sub-plot data from the Highfield Bare Fallow experiment, 1959-2014. The experiment was ploughed out of old grassland in 1959 and has been kept in bare fallow since by cultivation to suppress weeds. No crops are grown. SOC and total N as % and soil stock data.
